import React from 'react' function VideoDetails() { return (

{this.state.videoDetails[0].title}

By {this.state.videoDetails[0].channel}

{new Date(this.state.videoDetails[0].timestamp).toLocaleDateString()}

{this.state.videoDetails[0].views}

{this.state.videoDetails[0].likes}

{this.state.videoDetails[0].description}

) } export default VideoDetails
